data.title: AE Techron Expands Distributor Network in Europe
data.text:
July 1, 2024 - AE Techron is pleased to announce the expansion of two of our valuable sales distributors in Europe. HTEST has been part of our distributor network, covering Czechia, Hungary and Slovakia. They will now be servicing and supporting our customers in Romania. HTEST is a leading supplier of test and measurement instruments and systems for industry, education, and telecom. The company was established in 1999 in Prague, Czech republic. They provide instruments and systems for measurement of electrical and non-electrical quantities, telecom and datacom networks.

Testhouse Nordic is our current distributor in Finland and we have expanded their service area to now include Sweden, Latvia, Lithuania, and Estonia. Founded in 2005, Testhouse Nordic is the leading supplier of test and measurement products and solutions in the Nordic countries. Through their expertise and strong relationships with their suppliers, they offer products and services that regularly exceed a customer's expectations.

We are confident that these partnerships will provide our customers with outstanding quality and exceptional customer service, by consistently providing them with engineered solutions and industry-leading EMC test equipment and industrial amplifiers.

For more information or to learn more about our products, contact: sales@aetechron.com.

Testhouse Nordic | Ahventie 4, 02170 Espoo | +358 40 744 3082 | sales@testhouse.se | www.testhouse.se

AE Techron | 2507 Warren St., Elkhart, IN 46516 USA | +1 574-295-9495 | www.aetechron.com

AE Techron is a leading provider of high-quality, durable electronic products for research, the military, and industry â including EMC testing, MRI/NMR, and the power relay test industries. Out of this work have come lines of reliable power amplifiers, test systems, test and measurement products, and an inventory of electronic building blocks that help us to provide quick-to-market custom electronic solutions for our customers. Based in Elkhart, IN, U.S.A., AE Techron offers sales and service through a network of global distributors.
